text: Sergio Di Stefano (5 July 1939 â€“ 17 September 2010) was an Italian actor and voice actor. He was known for dubbing voices. These include Gregory House in the first six seasons of House and William Riker in Star Trek: The Next Generation. He was also a regular voice dubbing artist for John Malkovich and Jeff Bridges. Di Stefano died of a heart attack in Rome on 17 September 2010, aged 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Italian voice actors Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Actors from Rome
title: Sergio Di Stefano
